name: Little Bean Runner
description:
Welcome to Little Bean Runner! 

Enjoy this endless runner game where you want to get as far as you want without falling off or stepping on the spikes.

It seems easy, but I can assure you its way harder than it looks. So to help you guys out we added two different powerups.

Comment your guys high score on the comments to see who has the highest score.

--------------------------------------

Comment your high score on the comments to see who has the highest score. Goodluck everyone and enjoy the game! 

I also recommend playing on full screen, if not some of the character will be cut out of the game.
